description: This is a card with a drawing of a childish red dinosaur, breathing fire.  When activated, it could surprise you.
This is a card with a drawing of a childish green dinosaur, spraying acid.  When activated, it could surprise you.
A cleverly designed all-in-one tool which combines several smaller tools into a thick sized, card shaped plastic chunk.  Also holds a magnifying glass to start a fire.
Error if this spawn.
This is a blank card.  If you contact a proper person, then you could exchange this with a different card.
This is a unique card, which could be also used as a light.  If you activate it, it will glow like a glowstick for a short time.

use_action.msg: You activate the card, making it glow up.

description: This is glowing and producing light.  It will last for a short time before burning out.
revert_msg: The card fades out, turning to a blank one.
